Author: MyNamelessFace
Text: Oh I would love to have something like that.    We have a crosstrainer, but it's so damn loud, even when you're going really slow... that you can't even listen to music, or the music has to be even louder which is stupid because you get an instant headache!  But I'd love to just walk or go a little faster or running while  watching TV or something like that. Not even having to leave the house.  ... the dream.
